markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Old Soul](/Feats.aspx?ID=2345) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=215" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 26 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
at least 100 years old

</column>

---

Your immortal lineage has granted you a lifespan much longer than most mortals, and you've learned a lot along the way. You become trained in two skills of your choice.
name: Old Soul
